Package ca.concordia.controller.game

Class PlayerActions

java.lang.Object
ca.concordia.controller.game.PlayerActions
public class PlayerActions
extends java.lang.Object
Helper class that is used to 1. add player into player list 2. remove player from player list 3. assign countries to the player 4. assign armies to their countries of the players *

    • assignReinforcementPhase

      public int assignReinforcementPhase​(Player p_Player)
      All turns start with reinforcement. Each turn, each player receives a number of armies equal to: (max(3, # of countries the player own/3)+(continent value of all continents controlled by the player)). - Joey's message on discord
      Parameters:
      p_Player - "player for which the reinforcement is happening"

    • issueOrdersPhase

      public void issueOrdersPhase​(Player p_Player)
      The GameEngine class calls the issue_order() method of the Player. This method will wait for the following command, then create a deploy order object on the playerâ€™s list of orders, then reduce the number of armies in the playerâ€™s reinforcement pool.

      The game engine does this for all players in round-robin fashion until all the players have placed all their reinforcement armies on the map.

      Issuing order command: deploy countryID num (until all reinforcements have been placed)

      Parameters:
      p_Player - player is passed "to be updated"

    • executeOrderPhase

      public void executeOrderPhase​(Player p_Player)
